Class POJOResourceFactory

java.lang.Object
org.jboss.resteasy.plugins.server.resourcefactory.POJOResourceFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResourceFactory
public class POJOResourceFactory extends Object implements ResourceFactory
Allocates an instance of a class at each invocation
